articles.description: 吴说获悉，PancakeSwap V3 宣布已在 BNBChain 和以太坊上正式上线；与 V2 的 0.25% 相比，V3 将有四个不同的交易费等级，分别为 0.01%、0.05%、0.25% 和 1%；PancakeSwap V3 建立在 Uniswap V3 之上，并进行了改进，流动性提供者现在可以将他们的资金“集中”到更小的价格区间。https://blog.pancakeswap.finance/articles/introducing-pancake-swap-v3-a-more-efficient-and-user-friendly-dex-on-bnb-chain-and-ethereum

articles.title: Re FASB 加密更新旨在改变这种报告，以提高公司财务报表的准确性。阅读更多：https://www.ballardspahr.com/Insights/Alerts-and-Articles/2023/03/FASB-Propose...

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: Re 据 ballard spahr 分析，FASB 提出的指导方针将更像传统资产一样对待加密资产，并将提高估值的准确性。目前公认会计原则 (GAAP) 要求公司将持有的加密货币视为资产负债表上的“无限期无形资产”。换句话说，持有加密货币的公司只能在其财务报表中报告加密资产价值的减少而不是增加，直到出售。
articles.title: Re 据 ballard spahr 分析，FASB 提出的指导方针将更像传统资产一样对待加密资产，并将提高估值的准确性。目前公认会计原则 (GAAP) 要求公司将持有的加密货币视...

articles.description: 吴说获悉，据 Kaiko 分析，在  CFTC 提起诉讼以及币安停止大部分零费率活动后，币安的现货市场份额损失了 16% 达到 54%，在永续合约交易量方面仅损失了约 2% 的市场份额。此外美国市场上，Coinbase 市场份额从 60% 下降到 49%，币安美国从 8% 上升到 24%。https://blog.kaiko.com/binance-market-share-tumbles-16-fcb6d1dce7fe https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1642897248391675907

Bill Hughes : wchughes.eth 🦊: An underreported item in #crypto news:  FASB, the board that dictates accounting rules, has proposed that fungible crypto assets be marked to market on a company's books, not held at cost basis.
BIG CHANGE.
Also, crypto payments are booked as cash if converted immediately. https://t.co/fczxS5OlDu

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 吴说获悉，ConsenSys 律师 Bill Hughes 指出，制定会计规则的委员会 FASB 提议，加密资产在公司账簿上按市值计价，而不是按成本持有。他认为这是一个巨大的变化。此外如果加密资产被迅速转换为现金，加密支付将被记为现金，实体将被要求将这些现金收入分类为来自经营活动的现金流量。

articles.author: 链求君 | (C,C)
articles.description:
实在不想花钱，还想用 ChatGPT 的API key， 可以去Github 上面直接搜sk-开头的。

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo;
- As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. 
- Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? 
If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. 
Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both…

il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:
This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral.
Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.

Balaji: I will take that bet.
You buy 1 BTC.
I will send $1M USD.
This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k.
The term is 90 days.
All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

articles.description:
Whatever the topic Adam is consistently one of the most hysterical accounts in all of CT. https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1642655951818743811

Adam Cochran (adamscochran.eth): It’s kind of wild, Arbitrum had such a win in the rollup space when Optimism was too restrictive and Arb became the “chain of the people” and then they shot themselves in the foot.
So the entire race is up for grabs now, as Zks are starting to launch.
articles.title: Whatever the topic Adam is consistently one of the most hysterical accounts in all of CT. https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1642655951818743811

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Not a bad response https://twitter.com/arbitrum/status/1642653013062868992

Arbitrum (💙,🧡): Thanks to all the DAO participants and delegates for their feedback on AIP-1. It likely will not pass and we are committed to addressing the feedback received from the community.
More details in the thread 🧵👇
articles.title: Not a bad response https://twitter.com/arbitrum/status/1642653013062868992
